title: The Great Gatsby
description: A classic novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald that delves into themes of decadence, idealism, and the American Dream during the Jazz Age.
descriptionHtml: A classic novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald that delves into themes of decadence, idealism, and the American Dream during the Jazz Age.

title: Becoming
description: A memoir by Michelle Obama that chronicles her life from childhood to her time in the White House, emphasizing the importance of education and resilience.
descriptionHtml: A memoir by Michelle Obama that chronicles her life from childhood to her time in the White House, emphasizing the importance of education and resilience.

title: The Hobbit
description: J.R.R. Tolkien's beloved fantasy novel that follows the journey of Bilbo Baggins as he embarks on an epic adventure in Middle-earth.
descriptionHtml: J.R.R. Tolkien's beloved fantasy novel that follows the journey of Bilbo Baggins as he embarks on an epic adventure in Middle-earth.

title: The Lean Startup
description: Eric Ries presents a new approach to business that's being adopted around the world, emphasizing rapid prototyping and validated learning.
descriptionHtml: Eric Ries presents a new approach to business that's being adopted around the world, emphasizing rapid prototyping and validated learning.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
description: A novel by Delia Owens that tells the story of Kya, a young girl who raises herself in the marshes of North Carolina and becomes a suspect in a murder.
descriptionHtml: A novel by Delia Owens that tells the story of Kya, a young girl who raises herself in the marshes of North Carolina and becomes a suspect in a murder.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
description: Yuval Noah Harari explores the history of humankind, from the emergence of Homo sapiens to the present, examining how biology and history have defined us.
descriptionHtml: Yuval Noah Harari explores the history of humankind, from the emergence of Homo sapiens to the present, examining how biology and history have defined us.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
description: Mark Manson's counterintuitive approach to living a good life by embracing challenges and focusing on what truly matters.
descriptionHtml: Mark Manson's counterintuitive approach to living a good life by embracing challenges and focusing on what truly matters.

title: The Vanishing Half
description: A poignant novel by Brit Bennett that explores the lives of twin sisters who choose to live in two very different worlds, one black and one white.

title: The Power of Habit
description: Charles Duhigg examines the science behind why habits exist and how they can be changed to transform our lives.

title: The Goldfinch
